jobDescription: Fora Financial, located in NYC, is a leading financial services company providing working capital to small and mid-size businesses nationwide.  Established in 2008, we support small businesses in need of financing to sustain or grow their enterprise by providing innovative, customized, and flexible working capital solutions. We operate through a consultative approach, listening to customers and providing what best meets their needs in an ever-changing financial market.
